projectOverview: Co-developed a full-stack e-card generator app that features a live editor, card sharing functionality, and user/login registration.
projectHighlights: Developed a live editor using Web Storage API
Used AJAX and JSON to send and receive data from the database to save, build, and share cards
UX/UI Design & Branding
Responsive Design: mobile, tablet, and desktop friendly
projectNotes: Visit co-developer's (Allison Drake's) portfolio. This app wouldn't be the same without her contributions. Though the full version of this app has not yet been released, you can get an idea of how to use the app by playing with a demo of the live editor.

projectOverview: Developed a news feed generator that consumes the New York Times API.

UX/UI Design
